```{r setup}
library(larkin)
```

```{r data}
data_list <- list(
  T = 100,
  recruits = simulation$R_4[1:100],
  spawners = simulation$S[1:100],
  mu_alpha = 2,
  sd_alpha = 1,
  mu_beta = rep(1, 4),
  sd_beta = rep(2, 4)
)

```

```{r fitting}
# Fit
m1 <- larkin(data_list)
```
